name: Atul Parekh Memorial Trust
briefDescription: With a strong desire towards nation building, passion for working with people and a deep seeded trust that education empowers, APMT commenced in the year 2003. While walking the pathway for over a decade, APMT created various platforms in the field of education, health, nutrition, women empowerment and community development. This not just was to create opportunities but interdependence through inclusive synergy. Today from 30 it has grown to 75000 beneficiaries.Today, APMT  has created an ecosystem focusing on the holistic development much needed by our community. Yet immense work needs to be done. It is now time to scale up, empower many more lives and spread the wings of quality development nationwide.
